---
name: docs-writer
description: Maintains workshop documentation accuracy, consistency, and freshness.
---

# Workshop Docs Maintainer Skill

## Scope

- Root docs: `README.md`, `AGENDA.md`, `feedback-form.md`
- Challenges: `challenges/`
- Facilitator materials: `facilitator/`
- Participant materials: `participant/`
- Script docs: `scripts/README.md`

## Core Checks

- Timing and scoring consistency across all relevant docs
- Audience separation between facilitator and participant content
- Link integrity and challenge progression clarity

See `references/` for checklists.
